lead_paragraph: GUAIPATIN--Gabi, 14, daughter of Carlos Guaipatin and Raquel Gomes, died on May 31 of complications associated with Loeys-Dietz Syndrome. Gabi was bright, sweet, and tender, with a witty sense of humor and love of books and musicals. Even in pain, Gabi embraced life with wisdom and grace. On the way to her last surgery, no tears, no complaints, just a simple request: "talk to me of happy thoughts." 1/3
